LongDescription: You are standing in the heart of the city. Tall buildings surround you, and there's a buzz of activity. To the east is the Financial District, to the south is the Residential Area, and to the west is the Park District.

Quest.Description: Reduce the environmental impact of cities.

Good.Outcome: The city starts adopting more sustainable building practices!

Neutral.Outcome: You learned more about the city's challenges, but didn't directly contribute to solutions.

Bad.Outcome: This only contributes to air pollution!

LongDescription: Skyscrapers tower above, housing the city's financial institutions. The streets are busy with working professionals.

Quest.Description: Strengthen efforts to protect and safeguard the world’s cultural and natural heritage.

Good.Action: Donate to restoration of historical sites.
Good.Outcome: You've contributed to preserving the city's rich history!

Neutral.Outcome: You appreciated the city's heritage but didn't actively contribute.

Bad.Action: Ignore and walk past historical landmarks.
Bad.Outcome: Ignoring history might lead to its degradation.

LongDescription: A breath of fresh air in the city, this district has greenery, playgrounds, and a serene lake.

Quest.Description: Provide universal access to safe, inclusive and accessible green and public spaces.

Good.Action: Plant trees and promote community gardens.
Good.Outcome: The district is even greener and community-driven!

Neutral.Outcome: You enjoyed the green space but didn't leave a lasting impact.

Bad.Outcome: That's not helping the city's sustainability goals!

LongDescription: Rows of houses, apartments, and some local shops define this district. Families and children are often seen playing.

Quest.Description: Ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services.

Good.Outcome: You've helped ensure everyone has a roof over their heads!

Neutral.Action: Participate in a local yard sale.
Neutral.Outcome: It's community engagement, but not directly aiding housing access.

Bad.Action: Hoard properties and drive up rents.
Bad.Outcome: That's going against the goal of affordable housing for all.

LongDescription: Factories and warehouses dominate the landscape. You hear the distant hum of machinery.

Quest.Description: Reduce the adverse environmental impact of industries.

Good.Outcome: The industrial impact on the environment has been lessened!

Neutral.Action: Take a tour of a factory.
Neutral.Outcome: You're more informed but didn't directly reduce impacts.

Bad.Action: Waste resources and produce non-recyclable goods.
Bad.Outcome: This just adds to the environmental burden.
